text: transition wise it was really nice and smooth yeah I would agree it's a smooth feeling underfoot I'd give that back to the foam again that feeling that you have when you land with that Zoom X just kind of softens the blow and then it just rolls and the shape is held by the react X the heel I don't heal strike but I did find that it it almost feels a little bit like a stability shoe where I felt like I was getting guidance through my uh stride so I do think this could be for somebody who wants light stability this could be issue that they could turn to
